title: King Akbar's Daughter: Stories for Everyone as Told by Noor Inayat Khan
description: Noor's previously unpublished stories have been collected and are presented here in new English translations alongside her original French language versions and her known English renditions. Some of these stories are Noor's own creations, while others are traditional myths, fables, and legends retold in her own words and embroidered with her unique twists to best serve her purpose of teaching and inspiring children with tales of chivalry, compassion, love, hope and wisdom.
author: Noor Inayat Khan
